mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM , CAL.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM CALENDAR C INNER JOIN USERS U ON C.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE C.CALENDAR_YESNO='YES' ORDER BY c.calendar_date ) CAL ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC
SELECT * FROM CALENDAR INNER JOIN USERS ON CALENDAR.USER_NO = USERS.USER_NO WHERE UP_COUNT = (SELECT MAX(UP_COUNT) AS UP_COUNT FROM CALENDAR)
SELECT * FROM CALENDAR INNER JOIN USERS ON CALENDAR.USER_NO = USERS.USER_NO WHERE CALENDAR_NO = #{calNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECOMMEND WHERE CALENDAR_NO = #{calNo} AND USER_ID = (SELECT USER_NO FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECOMMEND VALUES (RECOMMEND_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT USER_NO FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID=#{user_id}), #{cal_no}, SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RECOMMEND WHERE CALENDAR_NO = #{cal_no} AND USER_ID= (SELECT USER_NO FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID=#{user_id})
mapper.select: SELECT UP_COUNT FROM CALENDAR WHERE CALENDAR_NO = #{cal_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS (COMMENT_NO, MAPP_STYPE, COMMENT_CONTENT, USER_NO, COMMENT_DATE, CONTENTID) VALUES ( COMMENTS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 1001, #{content}, ( SELECT USER_NO FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID=#{user_id} ), SYSDATE, #{cal_no} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM COMMENTS CMT INNER JOIN USERS U ON CMT.user_no = U.user_no WHERE CMT.CONTENTID = #{calNo} and MAPP_STYPE = 1001 ORDER BY COMMENT_DATE
